data.title: What is the climate like in Siberia? Would it be a good place to live as a prisoner?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 6): With the extreme weather in Siberia it is not suitable to move prisoners there and it is definitely not a good place for them to live or work in that area....and this is not counting the notorious Gulags and other detention centers and concentration camps in the area
